body.name: FYY LED Lighted Travel Makeup Mirror - Compact Pocket Mirror with Light and Magnification 1X/10X, 3.5in Rechargeable 2-Sided Makeup Mirror with 3 Light Colors & Adjustable Brightness for Women, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 49 mins
features: 1X/10X Magnifying Double-sided Mirroring: Our Rechargeable Travel Makeup Mirror boasts dual reflective surfaces - a standard mirror and a 10x magnification mirror. Whether it's your daily makeup routine or intricate detailing, this mirror has you covered.

Three Lighting Modes: Enjoy three distinct lighting modes: natural light, cool white, and warm light. Effortlessly switch between them to adapt to different environments and your specific preferences, guaranteeing impeccable makeup in any lighting condition.
Adjustable Brightness: With a touch-sensitive button, you can fine-tune the LED lights' brightness to your liking. No more dealing with insufficient lighting or harsh glares.

Type-C Charging: For your convenience, our LED Compact Mirror supports Type-C data cable charging. Forget about constantly replacing batteries–simply plug in the Type-C cable for an eco-friendly and convenient charging solution.

Lightweight and Portable: Designed to be lightweight and easily transportable, this Small Hand Pocket Mirror is your go-to for beauty on the go. Whether you're at home, in the office, traveling, or attending events, it's effortless to carry, ensuring you maintain your flawless appearance.

Enjoy three distinct lighting modes: natural light, cool white, and warm light.

Does it rechargeable? Yes, it is rechargeable. The brightness of LED lights is adjustable? Yes, the light is adjustable. Enjoy three distinct lighting modes: natural light, cool white, and warm light Does it come with a USB cable? Yes, it will come with a USB cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very very handy
reviews.reviewText: this thing is great!! very happy to have it. i had a hello kitty led compact thats light stopped working and looked into getting a new one. the color of this one is so cute and it genuinely feels like its better quality than the more expensive hk one i got from impressions vanity. it turns out to feel very smooth and slips into my bags nicely. It has a good weight to it, but i will say that the outside finish of it does get dirty easily and is a bit tough to clean sometimes. my eyeliner flecks sometimes get on it and even using alcohol i'd still need to work at it to get it to be pink again. it could just be the eyeliner formula, but i dont think it should be harder to get off a plastic surface than my skin. other than that, thats my only complaint. there's three different light tone settings, you can adjust the brightness of each tone, and the most important thing to me is IT REMEMBERS what you set it at. my old compact didn't automatically turn off when i shut it, and this one does. but when i open it back up, it remembers which tone i was using at what brightness. and i can cycle to a different tone and it'll remember the brightness i set that one to. its so convenient as i am a huge makeup enthusiast and having a good quality mirror like this is everything!! and best of all, its rechargeable. the port is in a weird spot, but doesnt bother me particularly at all, but some may find it awkward. the magnification is really good and there's no distortion in the reflections that i could notice. i have a ton of compacts and this one hits every check box!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the feel of this compact mirror in my hand! It is so smooth and the weight assures it will not topple out unexpectedly. It is 3 1/2"x 3 1/2" and 3/4" thick. A light surrounds each of the two mirrors, one normal and one magnifying. To change the lighting from cool to warm, just tap the power spot on the magnifying mirror until are happy with it. A short charging cord is included, so no long cord will be dangling to cause accidents.Overall, I love this mirror. I had originally thought it would make a good gift, but I'm keeping it. It is great for seeing those tiny eyebrow and nose hairs that I want to pluck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cute and small, but flimsy and needs to be constantly recharged

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mirror on point!
reviews.reviewText: The last mirror I had in my purse broke after someone mishandled my purse on accident. I was very bummed because I used that mirror for doing my makeup on the go. After looking for another mirror, I came across the FYY Rechargeable Led Compact Makeup Mirror with Lights and Magnification. I am so glad I did. I love this mirror actually more than the one I had previously. I think the shape, the magnification, and the lighting seems so much better. I love using this mirror, it makes applying my makeup so much smoother, easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is as described with the lighting and magnification. Definitely a handy mirror if you travel a lot or need a quick touch up and no rest room nearby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel and car
reviews.reviewText: The mirror with LED light is great for use in the car. We kept this one in the car and inside the dark cabin, the led light came in very handy. It is charged by usb c cable which is the same as charging cable for the phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fits perfectly in my travel bag or small purse. Great for on the go and would make a great gift! I love that it's double sided and different shades of light. Ordered several for friends and family
